author: Kurt Zindulka, Kurt Zindulka
title: 'It Was a Lot Worse Than I Imagined': Berlin Left-Wing District Mayor Who Intentionally Caught Coronavirus
description: A district mayor in Berlin said that he "almost deliberately" infected himself with coronavirus in order to develop an immunity to the Chinese virus.
content:
A district mayor in German capital Berlin said that he “almost deliberately” infected himself with coronavirus in order to develop an immunity to the Chinese virus.
The District Mayor for Mitte in Berlin, Stephan von Dassel, defended his decision to purposef… [+1975 chars]
